Everyone who loves the homeland can say with pride that I am an Azerbaijani citizen.
The world is developing on the basis of initiative. Therefore, great attention is paid to innovations in Azerbaijan.
Penalties and administrative measures are not enough to combat corruption and bribery.
In this case, there was a great need for systemic, institutional measures.
This social issue is finding a positive solution through ASAN service. We must practice this practice in all other areas.
Azerbaijan is a country with unique experience of development, transformation and reform in the world.
ASAN Service is a product of Azerbaijan, a brand of Azerbaijan and we are not only interested in our oil and gas resources, (cont) http://t.co/diYNRY2TnQ
The successes we have obtained have been made possible by the well-thought-out reforms. Today Azerbaijan is known worldwide as a successful model.
Today, the power and potential of the countries are solved by knowledge and knowledge. Where technological and scientific progress is, development is there.
Our young people are genuine patriotic young people. Every young person should try to strengthen our country, (cont) http://t.co/jAtSAbuOPb
Over the past few years, Azerbaijan has not been the second country in terms of economic development.
Azerbaijani citizens will not feel the drop in oil prices in the world. We have very strong economic support.
We are pursuing an independent policy. No external force can influence our will.
We do not sit and sit down with anyone's back.

The advisor now takes this profile to tweet excerpts from the speech of President Dilma after being a graduate of the TSE.
We are fulfilling the desire of the majority of the Brazilian people, legitimized by the strong + power of democracy, which emanates from the popular vote.
By virtue of this imperative, I receive this diploma renewing my oath to obey, in any circumstance, the laws of my Country.
As well as that of using my authority to make them respected, no matter what sacrifice becomes necessary.
Fulfilling the popular will is a generous mission because instead of oppressing it it frees us; and instead of weakening it strengthens us
Being the first woman elected and re-elected to occupy the highest office of the nation leaves my soul full of joy, responsibility and fearlessness.
But it fills my heart, above all, with hope - and it is this hope that I want to share with all the Brazilian people.
We are a nation built with the signs of courage, faith and hope, and these signs give us the vital force to move forward.
RT @TVNBR: Pres. Dilma Rousseff addresses the # TSE diploma ceremony. Follow on @TVNBR http://t.co/p3mX3NujNU
The elections in Brazil have been a permanent proof that our democracy is solid and that our institutions work better and better.
The people, in their wisdom, choose who he wants to govern and whom he wants to be opposed. That simple.
European Council finished. On time. Conclusions on investment & #Ukraine agreed. Now first #EUCO press conference
It is up to those who were chosen to govern, to govern well. It is up to those who have been chosen to oppose, to the best of their ability, their role.
More important and more difficult than knowing how to lose is knowing how to win.
To know how to overcome is to recognize the right to a dignified life for all and to strive with all the strength to make it a reality.
To know how to win is to break free from the bonds of individual and partisan interests, and to offer, with courage, what we have best for our Country
What I have the best and I want in a renewed way to offer my country is the fidelity to my convictions and the breadth of my commitments.
Commitments already known, announced and applied, throughout my life, from my first government and my campaign.
What I want to offer my country is the renewed struggle for social justice, quality education, equal opportunities (...)
(...), economic and political stability, and commitment to ethics.
Social justice founded on the struggle for the reduction of inequality, distribution of income, guarantee of employment, salary and human rights.
Stability based on sustained growth, on inflation control, on growth q will accelerate faster than some would imagine.
Governance structured in a solid majority in Congress and in popular participation.
Commitment to ethics mirrored, first, in the example of integrity and personal honesty (...)
(...) and, from this level, made concrete in the determination to find and punish all kinds of irregularities and badly done.
We can not turn a blind eye to an indisputable truth: it is time for Brazil to stop corruption.
We must create a new awareness of public morality and imbue this spirit with the present and next generations.
I know this is a work of more than a generation. I want to be the president who helped make this process irreversible.
Some Petrobras employees were hit in the anti-corruption process.
We are facing this situation with fearlessness and we will convert the renewal of Petrobrás into transforming energy of our Country.
We have to rigorously investigate everything wrong that was done.
We must, above all, create mechanisms to prevent such events from happening again.
Petrobrás and Brazil are bigger than q qlq problem and crisis, so we have the capacity to overcome them and to emerge better and stronger.
I am one of those women who do not give up, nor allow themselves to be overcome by adversity.
I am one of those women who dedicate their entire existence, and are able to give their lives for the sake of their families, their people and their Country.
It is with hope, with great faith and courage, + once, I summon all men and women of good will (...)
(...) q accompany me on this journey of transformation and changes in Brazil.
